verbs.description: Emmanuel Ogebe , [ARG0: a Nigerian human rights lawyer] [R-ARG0: who] [V: practices] [ARGM-LOC: in the U.S.] , explains why President Trump 's insults about Nigerians sting . Such insults are not new .
